definitions.text: trying something to find out about it
examples: a sample for ten days free trial
a trial of progesterone failed to relieve the pain
he survived the great test of battle
candidates must compete in a trial of skill

definitions.text: (law) the determination of a person's innocence or guilt by due process of law
examples: he had a fair trial and the jury found him guilty
most of these complaints are settled before they go to trial

definitions.text: (sports) a preliminary competition to determine qualifications
examples: the trials for the semifinals began yesterday

definitions.text: an annoying or frustrating or catastrophic event
examples: his mother-in-law's visits were a great trial for him
